mapper.select: select problem_id, problem_name, problem_type, problem_address, problem_desc, problem_pic, problem_notes, problem_status, confirm_user_id, confirm_user, deal_user_id, deal_user, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete from problem where problem_id = #{problemId}
mapper.insert: insert into problem(problem_name, problem_type, problem_address, problem_desc, problem_pic, problem_notes, problem_status, confirm_user_id, confirm_user, deal_user_id, deal_user, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete) values (#{problemName}, #{problemType}, #{problemAddress}, #{problemDesc}, #{problemPic}, #{problemNotes}, #{problemStatus}, #{confirmUserId}, #{confirmUser}, #{dealUserId}, #{dealUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{delete})

insert into problem(problem_name, problem_type, problem_address, problem_desc, problem_pic, problem_notes, problem_status, confirm_user_id, confirm_user, deal_user_id, deal_user, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete) values
(#{entity.problemName}, #{entity.problemType}, #{entity.problemAddress}, #{entity.problemDesc}, #{entity.problemPic}, #{entity.problemNotes}, #{entity.problemStatus}, #{entity.confirmUserId}, #{entity.confirmUser}, #{entity.dealUserId}, #{entity.dealUser}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.updateUser}, #{entity.delete})

insert into problem(problem_name, problem_type, problem_address, problem_desc, problem_pic, problem_notes, problem_status, confirm_user_id, confirm_user, deal_user_id, deal_user, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete) values
(#{entity.problemName}, #{entity.problemType}, #{entity.problemAddress}, #{entity.problemDesc}, #{entity.problemPic}, #{entity.problemNotes}, #{entity.problemStatus}, #{entity.confirmUserId}, #{entity.confirmUser}, #{entity.dealUserId}, #{entity.dealUser}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createUser}, #{entity.updateUser}, #{entity.delete})
on duplicate key update problem_name = values(problem_name), problem_type = values(problem_type), problem_address = values(problem_address), problem_desc = values(problem_desc), problem_pic = values(problem_pic), problem_notes = values(problem_notes), problem_status = values(problem_status), confirm_user_id = values(confirm_user_id), confirm_user = values(confirm_user), deal_user_id = values(deal_user_id), deal_user = values(deal_user), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), create_user = values(create_user), update_user = values(update_user), delete = values(delete)
mapper.update:
update problem
problem_name = #{problemName},
problem_type = #{problemType},
problem_address = #{problemAddress},
problem_desc = #{problemDesc},
problem_pic = #{problemPic},
problem_notes = #{problemNotes},
problem_status = #{problemStatus},
confirm_user_id = #{confirmUserId},
confirm_user = #{confirmUser},
deal_user_id = #{dealUserId},
deal_user = #{dealUser},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_user = #{createUser},
update_user = #{updateUser},
delete = #{delete},
where problem_id = #{problemId}
